Who is being praised for his chivalry at the SAG Awards?
Austin Butler
What event was Austin Butler attending?
29th Annual Screen Actors Guild awards
What was Austin Butler nominated for?
Outstanding Performance by a Male Actor in a Leading Role
Which movie did Austin Butler act in that led to his nomination?
Baz Luhrmann's Elvis
Who won the award for Outstanding Performance by a Male Actor in a Leading Role?
Brendan Fraser
Which actor did Austin Butler help walk to the stage?
Sally Field
What award did Sally Field win?
Life Achievement Award
Who presented the Life Achievement Award to Sally Field?
Andrew Garfield
Which actor did Austin Butler also help walk to the stage?
Jennifer Coolidge
What award did Jennifer Coolidge win?
Outstanding Performance by a Female Actor in a Drama Series
